text:
### SCENE 10 – Niha Visits Hero’s Room  

_Hero walks out; Niha enters, looks around. Hero re-enters._

**Niha:** Ou…! Hello.  
**Arjun:** Hi…!  
**Niha:** Shwetha rammannadhi…  
**Arjun:** Hmm—tanadhi pakka room.  
**Niha:** Oh… _starts to leave_  
**Arjun:** Aina… chelli intlo ledhu…  
**Niha:** Avna? _checks phone_ Call chesindi—rammani… _low voice_  
**Arjun:** Yeah… vacchestadhi. _gestures_ Please…  
_Niha sits on the bed; Arjun grabs a chair. She notices stacks of papers._

**Niha:** Enti ivanni?  
**Arjun:** Actually naku **direction** ante interest… so—  
**Niha:** Oh! Script papers aa? Nice!  
**Arjun:** Y-y-yeah.  
**Niha:** Enni movie scripts ivi?  
**Arjun:** Oka short film vi…  
**Niha:** Oh.  
**Arjun:** So… **Aadhya Ramakrishnan**—Tamil?  
_Niha skims pages, smiles._  
**Niha:** Yes.  
**Arjun:** Tamil ela nerchukunedhi?  
**Niha:** Oka manchi Tamil friend unte nerchukovochu. _stands, walks to door_  
**Arjun:** Naku nerchukovali ani undhi… _steps closer_  
**Niha:** First Telugu nerchuko—script lo anni pacchi buthulu unnayi.  
**Arjun:** *Ou!*  
_Phone rings._

**Arjun (on phone):** Aa… cheppu. Ha, ikkade undi—Shwetha… _hands phone to Niha_  
**Niha:** Ha Shwetha, ha… vastunnam. _cuts call_  
**Niha:** Temple daggara undhi anta—rammantundhi.  
**Arjun:** Temple ka? **NO way.**

_Scene cuts: Arjun now riding pillion side-saddle on Niha’s bike._

---
